titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the ninth day of November, one thousand six hundred eighty eighth years present in Council, the Earl of Perth, Lord High Chancellor, the Lord Arch-bishop of St. Andrews ... the following depositions concerning the birth of His royal Highness James, Prince of Scotland and Wales, being transmitted to His Majesties Privy Council ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of p. [1], 2nd numbering; initial letter, headpiece.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
